Zachary Willson is a undergraduate Computer Science major studying at The University of California, Davis and a transfer student from Allan Hanckock College. Zachary is currently an inten for the UCSB-Smithsonian Scholars program, 
assiting Dr. Alex White in developing machine learning tools to identify Santa Cruz Island Skunk sightings on camera traps located in the Channel Islands. Zachary's work in the deployment 
of machine learning tools helps facilatate ongoing quantitative ecological research being conducted on Santa Cruz Island.
